alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Logan; Madison; Miami; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 12:46PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHAMPAIGN...SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN...CLARK...NORTHERN GREENE AND NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...SOUTHERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 115 PM EST... At 1246 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near North Lewisburg to 6 miles west of Northridge to near Vandalia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Springfield, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Xenia, Trotwood, Marysville, Vandalia, Englewood, Urbana, London, Tipp City, New Carlisle, West Milton, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Northridge, Plain City, and Cedarville. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 26 and 77. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 56 and 69. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Logan; Madison; Miami; Union
